ing: 1 cup fresh spinach, or more to taste
1 cup cold water, or as needed to cover
des: "Prepare this refreshing and tangy smoothie at night and blend in the morning for the best breakfast ever. For a sweeter smoothie, double the maple syrup or honey. This recipe fits perfectly in a Magic BulletÂ® blender cup!"
ins: Combine spinach, banana, avocado, kiwi, lemon juice, mint, almonds, maple syrup, and flax seeds in a blender. Add enough water to almost cover ingredients; blend until smooth. Add ice and blend thoroughly.
